translation.CAN_I_HELP_PLANNING_YOURS: Can I help you planning yours?
translation.WHAT_ARE_THE_DEPARTURE_AND_ARRIVAL_POINT: Firstly, I'll need to know which are your possible points of departure and arrival as well as the cities you'd like to visit.
translation.USE_SAME_DEPARTURE_AND_ARRIVAL_POINTS: Use the same points of departure and arrival
